original_text: And the king went up to the house of the Lord, with all the men of Judah and the inhabitants of Jerusalem and the priests and the Levites, all the people both great and small. And he read in their hearing all the words of the Book of the Covenant that had been found in the house of the Lord.
korean_text: 여호와의 전에 올라가매 유다 모든 사람과 예루살렘 주민들과 제사장들과 레위 사람들과 모든 백성이 노소를 막론하고 다 함께 한지라 왕이 여호와의 전 안에서 발견한 언약책의 모든 말씀을 읽어 무리의 귀에 들려 주고

sentences.original_text: And the king went up to the house of the Lord
with all the men of Judah
and the priests and the Levites
all the people both great and small
sentences.korean_translation: 큰 자나 작은 자 모든 백성과 함께

sentences.original_text: And he read in their hearing
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 그들이 듣는 가운데 읽었으니

sentences.original_text: all the words of the Book of the Covenant
that had been found in the house of the Lord
